components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE,ELECTRICAL SYSTEM
summary: MY BLINKERS STOPPED WORKING IN AUGUST 2002.  DEALER REPAIRED UNDER WARRANTY. JANUARY 2003 CHECK ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON.  CAR OFF WARRANTY; TURBO CUT OFF VALVE REPLACED AND COOLANT TEMP SENSOR.  CHECK ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON A COUPLE WEEKS LATER.  TOOK GTI TO DEALER AGAIN. DEALER REPLACED THE FUEL PUMP RELAY.  NOW, 3 DAYS LATER THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON AGAIN.   *NLM
